==Translingual==

===Alternative forms===
* {{l|mul|瞾}}

===Etymology===
[[w:Wu Zetian|Wu Zetian]] chose 曌 (sometimes [[瞾]]) as her own name after she became the female emperor of China. 曌 and 瞾 both are variations of [[照]], and both were used during her regime only.
